title: Bunny.net DNS Provider Integration
description:
Integrate Bunny.net as a third DNS provider option alongside Oracle DNS and Cloudflare. This enables offering DNS and CDN services through Bunny.net's global Anycast network with 36+ PoPs.

Implementation includes:
- bunny_dns_manager.py provider module
- API updates to support bunny provider selection
- Admin UI updates for Bunny domain management
- SQL migration for provider support
- Integration testing with a test domain

Features:
- Global Anycast DNS with sub-20ms latency
- CDN integration via PullZone records
- CNAME flattening for apex domains
- DNSSEC support
- Scriptable DNS capability
testing_plan: Test zone creation, record CRUD, and DNSSEC on a small domain
rollback_plan: Remove bunny provider from PROVIDER_CONFIG and revert code changes
